sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Grid, Table, Container } from 'semantic-ui-react'; class Phat extends React.Component { render() { const { squat, bench, deadlift, ohp, powerclean, squatIncrement, benchIncrement, deadliftIncrement, ohpIncrement, powercleanIncrement } = this.props const squatA = Math.floor(squat * .7); const squatB = Math.floor ((squatA + squatAdded)); const squatBA = Math.floor(squatB * .7); const squatC = Math.floor(squatB + squatAdded); const squatCA = Math.floor(squatC * .7); const squatD = Math.floor(squatC + squatAdded); const squatDA = Math.floor(squatC * .7); return (
TEXAS METHOD Day A Day B Day A Week 1

Squat: {squatWeek1A} 5x5

Bench Press: {benchWeek1A} 5x5

Power Clean: {powerWeek1A} 3x5

Squat: {squatWeek1B} 5x2

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek1B} 5x2

GHR/Back Extension: 10-15x3

Squat: {squatWeek1C} 5x1

Bench Press: {benchWeek1C} 5x1

Deadlift: {deadWeek1C} 5x1

 Week 2

Squat: {squatWeek2A} 5x5

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek2A} 5x5

Power Clean: {powerWeek2A} 3x5

Squat: {squatWeek2B} 5x2

Bench Press: {benchWeek1B} 5x3

GHR/Back Extension: 10-15x3

Squat: {squatWeek2C} 5x1

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek2C} 5x1

Deadlift: {deadWeek2C} 5x1

 Week 3

Squat: {squatWeek3A} 5x5

Bench Press: {benchWeek2A} 5x5

Power Clean: {powerWeek3A} 3x5

Squat: {squatWeek3B} 5x2

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek2B} 5x2

GHR/Back Extension: 10-15x3

Squat: {squatWeek3C} 5x1

Bench Press: {benchWeek2C} 5x1

Deadlift: {deadWeek3C} 5x1

 Week 4

Squat: {squatWeek4A} 5x5

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek3A} 5x5

Power Clean: {powerWeek4A} 3x5

Squat: {squatWeek4B} 5x2

Bench Press: {benchWeek3B} 5x2

GHR/Back Extension: 10-15x3

Squat: {squatWeek4C} 5x1

Overhead Press: {ohpWeek3C} 5x1

Deadlift: {deadWeek4C} 5x1
) }; }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { squat: Math.floor(Number(state.maxes.squat) * .90), bench: Math.floor(Number(state.maxes.bench) * .90), deadlift: Math.floor(Number(state.maxes.deadlift) * .90), ohp: Math.floor(Number(state.maxes.ohp) * .90), powerclean: Math.floor(Number(state.maxes.powerclean) * .90), squatIncrement: Number(state.maxes.squatIncrement), benchIncrement: Number(state.maxes.benchIncrement), deadliftIncrement: Number(state.maxes.deadliftIncrement), ohpIncrement: Number(state.maxes.ohpIncrement), powercleanIncrement: Number(state.maxes.powercleanIncrement) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Phat);
